org.apache.poi.common.usermodel.fonts

Interface FontInfo

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FontHeader, HemfFont, HSLFFontInfo, HSLFFontInfoPredefined, HwmfFont, XSLFFontInfo 

    public interface FontInfo
    A FontInfo object holds information about a font configuration. It is roughly an equivalent to the LOGFONT structure in Windows GDI.

    If an implementation doesn't provide a property, the getter will return null - if the value is unset, a default value will be returned.

    Setting a unsupported property results in an UnsupportedOperationException.

    (FontInfo对象保存有关字体配置的信息。它大致相当于Windows LDI中的LOGTOS结构。如果实现不提供属性，getter将返回空-如果值未设置，则将返回默认值。设置不受支持的属性会导致UnsportedOperationExcellent。)
    Since:
    POI 3.17-beta2
    See Also:
    LOGFONT structure

    • Method Detail

      • getIndex

        default java.lang.Integer getIndex()
        Get the index within the collection of Font objects(获取Font对象集合中的索引)
        Returns:
        unique index number of the underlying record this Font represents (probably you don't care unless you're comparing which one is which)(此Font代表的基础记录的唯一索引号（您可能不在乎，除非您比较哪个是哪个）)

      • setIndex

        default void setIndex(int index)
        Sets the index within the collection of Font objects(设置Font对象集合中的索引)
        Parameters:
        index - the index within the collection of Font objects(index -Font对象集合中的索引)
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if unsupported(java.lang. UnsportedOperationResponse异常-如果不支持)

      • getTypeface

        java.lang.String getTypeface()
        Returns:
        the full name of the font, i.e. font family + type face(字体全名，即字体系列+字体面)

      • setTypeface

        default void setTypeface(java.lang.String typeface)
        Sets the font name(设置字体名称)
        Parameters:
        typeface - the full name of the font, when null removes the font definition - removal is implementation specific(字体-字体的全名，当为空时会删除字体定义-删除特定于实现)

        Returns:

        default FontPitch getPitch()

      • getPanose

        default byte[] getPanose()
        Returns:
        panose info in binary form or null if unknown(全景信息为二进制形式，如果未知，则为空)

      • setPanose

        default void setPanose(byte[] panose)
        Set the panose in binary form(将全景设置为二进制形式)
        Parameters:
        panose - the panose bytes(panose -panose字节)

      • getFacets

        @Beta
default java.util.List<? extends FontFacet> getFacets()
        If font facets are embedded in the document, return the list of embedded facets. The font embedding is experimental, therefore the API can change.(如果文档中嵌入了字体方面，请返回嵌入方面的列表。字体嵌入是实验性的，因此API可以更改。)
        Returns:
        the list of embedded EOT font data(嵌入的ECT字体数据列表)
